column5: For some reason today, I remembered and old of Family Feud...  Anybody remember this old episode of Family Feud where this happened ...  Host - Ok, the Butler family for the steal  Host - "Name a fruit that starts with the Letter "A".  [ Host polls each member of the Butler family for answers - all of them answer with logical responses like apricot, apple, etc.]  [ After polling the family, the host then approaches the father for a response on behalf of the family ]  Butler Family Father - "You know Ray, Im gonna go out on me own ... I'm gonna say "Arange!" (said in a Jamaican accent).  If you can find this online please post a link!  Thanks.
i have looked and looked and looked and was never able to find it..  I would love to see it.  I think its an urban legend!
nope, I remember it well, I watched it!  I think I pee'ed a little at the time to from
